House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07825
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE NATIONAL COUNCIL FOR THE PRESERVATION OF MANGROVE FORESTS
ABSTRACT : Aims to ensure the preservation, reforestation and sustainable development of the mangrove resources through the establishment of reservation areas exclusively for mangrove forests. Enumerates certain prohibited acts that may damage or destruct the mangrove forests and provides penalties for violations of such acts.
ALIAS NAME : “The Mangrove Forest Protection and Preservation Act.”
